website_summaries.verdict: With dual controls and 10 different temperature settings, this mattress pad will keep you cozy in any weather.
pros: Quilted cotton top with polyester bottom
Safe for machine washing and drying
Comes in King or Queen size
cons: Display is challenging to read at night
Some are bothered by the circuit box at their feet

customer_reviews.title: Size is Everything
customer_reviews.text: Went to use for the first time, and there was a post-it note on the outside of the plastic package stating "scans as Queen Size, but is a King" I was really hoping this would not be the case again, so upon fitting it up to my bed, BAM - it is a king size :( Customer service, please contact me ASAP as this appears to be outside of the return window now,
customer_reviews.author: Crammin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.  Heat stays on my side.
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable - don't feel the wires. I prefer this over the electric blanket we had years ago because it stays on my side of the bed. The main disadvantage, compared to a blanket, is that if it gets too hot you can't throw the covers back and cool down. So I keep it at its lowest setting. Cons: Cannot read the display at night. Would prefer a separate zone for the lower half of my body Would prefer an adjustable timer
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T.

customer_reviews.title: Very warm an toasty
customer_reviews.text: The heating part of this is nice. The controls are ok, there are two, but so light they easily slide off the table, and their display screen angle makes them only easily visible from above. My biggest complaint is the junction box at the end. It's centered, solid, and inset in a good 8-inches from the edge of the bed. You definitely feel it, even with a pad over it. You can reverse it to put the junction under/between the pillows, but you still feel it there too. I would have much preferred to have it in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Unpredictable
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 4 months. Sometimes it heats well & other times barely at all, using the same settings. Expensive & a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn T

customer_reviews.title: Toasty and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Since we are being blessed with at least 7 months of WINTER here in Montana this year, my new heated mattress pad is totally appreciated!! This is definitely a better quality than the last one, which died mid-winter at only 2 years old :( This heats up VERY rapidly and at the highest setting is ALMOST too warm. I preheat the bed and turn it off as I get in..... perfect!! I only hope this has a longer life than previous ones. It certainly was spendier, and I will see if “you get what you pay for”!!
customer_reviews.author: MotherChickie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and quality for a whole month
customer_reviews.text: Update: two weeks ago I started getting the F2 error. I tried unplugging and plugging in and restarting, but no luck. Of course, I missed the return window by five days. The quilting isn't as plush as I hoped, but definitely better than any other mattress pads. I don't feel the wires at all. This seems like a nice quality item so far. It gets VERY warm! I like that the cord is long enough that I can have both controls on my nightstand, instead of one on each nightstand. The plug is at the foot, but it is in the middle, so my feet don't find it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This heated mattress pad is awesome! It keeps me nice and warm all night and I love that it has an automatic shut off feature (it comes in handy when I forget to turn it off in the morning). Even mid-winter in the North East I usually only need to use the lowest few settings to be toasty. Additionally, my cats love the warmth as well and all snuggle on the bed when I turn it on. Plus it's machine washable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Noteworthy285

customer_reviews.title: Great warm addition to our guest room.
customer_reviews.text: I have a king size version of this and it works wonderfully on cold nights. My husband likes to sleep cool but I like warmth, at least for a little while. I bought the queen size for our guest room and was surprised that it is a dual-controlled mattress pad. I did try it out and it heats just like our king size does. It leaves one side cool for those that don't like to sleep warm.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Foxworthy

customer_reviews.title: Only last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but they only seem to work for a year. It’s highly disappointing that there isn’t any longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, didn’t last a year!
customer_reviews.text: This is only the second season I have had this mattress pad. It has started to get cold here so I put it on our bed for the first time this season. Neither side of the mattress pad heats up. I’m going to need to purchase another after less than a year. This thing didn’t even last a year! VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I don’t want to get out of my bed.
customer_reviews.text: This heated king size mattress pad is everything. I had a sunbeam queen size heated mattress pad for 10 years with out any problems. We recently upgraded our bedroom from queen size to king size bedroom furniture and I expect this one sunbeam to last for even longer. Thank you for comforting my Herrington rod infused spinal cord with warmth and comfort in every direction and making my bed my haven. This feels amazing and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Tychelle Mosely

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality but I ordered a queen size and received a king-size. Will not return it as I can use it as another gift for someone else. But still need to re order the original Queen.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great pad.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heated mattress pad but I decided that I prefer an electric blanket as this only warms whatever part of your body is directly touching it and since I am cold natured I was still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother, it worked for six weeks then one half died.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: The heated mattress pad is perfect. It has already been great and winter is ...
customer_reviews.text: The heated mattress pad is perfect. It has already been great and winter is here yet. I have only used the preheat feature so far and it is great to get into a nice warm bed.
customer_reviews.author: S A Wise

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, you can’t feel the heating wires. Heats up quickly. Not too easy to see the controls at night though.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Nice upgrade from the older model. Very comfortable and we can’t feel the heating coils. Warms up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cushiony! Love that I can turn mine down, while my husband roasts! I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Berg

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my sister and she is very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Globe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Heating
customer_reviews.text: I had this product and it worked great for 1 year. The second year, one side did not heat. I just pulled it out of storage and it does not heat at all. I would expect this to work for more than one year. Don't know if it is the controls or the cover, so I don't want to order new controls and find out that was not the problem.
customer_reviews.author: B. Layton

customer_reviews.title: Now available again at Costco stores
customer_reviews.text: We had one for several years. It finally died, but we purchased a new on online from Sunbeam.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bit of luxury
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to get into a warm bed when it's so chilly outside! Easy to fit over the mattress and the two displays are easy to operate. We also love the two different zones as my wife likes it warmer than I do! Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is cozy warm on cold nights. Highly recommend. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sherrilyn Dolman-Estep

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bed nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Product is as it was described. Can’t feel the wires inside it. Keeps the bed nice and warm! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully and I olove that it has the automatic shut ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my friend who is always freezing. It works wonderfully and I olove that it has the automatic shut off as my friend is older and tends to forget to turns things off ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - good price
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad was easy to install and setup. Controls are easy to use and the product works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MarkMD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected great product no issues with quality or shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Poor design. The power plug is on top of the pad at your feet. No way to avoid feeling it. Don't waste your money on a poorly thought out design. Very annoying to be woken up by it in the middle of the night. I'm tossing it out.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF L.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty control
customer_reviews.text: Got this just this week. Out of the bag & on bed one control would not turn on! Not good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: paulapumpkin

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely LOVED this thing until it stopped working two weeks after ...
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVED this thing until it stopped working two weeks after we bought it. The control just says “F2” and won’t turn on at all. For the price we really expected better.
customer_reviews.author: steele mccall

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Warm and cozy, but I can feel the wires under my hip when I lie on my side. My husband doesn't feel them at all. I expect most people won't, but I could, even with a matress cover on top. Not a big deal, I just have to shift about an inch forward it backwards. I love having it preheat the bed. Both sides are controlled separately, and there's little to no heat transfer to the other half. It's been great. My husband runs a lot warmer than me, and this makes us both comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce M.

customer_reviews.title: NOT QUEEN SIZE !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Despite what the description says, this is NOT a queen size pad!!! It is a KING size. I ordered the queen size once, got a king. Sent it back for a replacement, got another king. In talking with an on-line rep, I learned the many people have had to deal with this issue. Save your self the trouble and don't get it if you need the queen size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Can't give a good review at this time
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item -- twice. Ordered a queen size, received a king size. Let them know of the mistake, and returned the queen. Got a SECOND king size. Returned it and asked for a refund. Probably works great, but will never know. Went to the store and bought one off the shelf -- different brand, but same concept. For those who hate cold sheets, a mattress pad warmer is heaven!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Swetzof

customer_reviews.title: Great performer. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the bed in our camper van. Took it on a 2 week camping trip and it was a total game changer, no more chilly nights! Easy to set up, easy to operate... there are several temp settings but I never went above Low or 2. My husband said Level 4 was too warm for him. We camped in 20F overnight low temps and felt totally cozy. I’m sure this electric mattress pad would perform equally as good in a traditional residential setting. Having dual side controls is really nice too; one person can have their side completely off while the other’s is on.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Con-it's hard to see the dial in the dark Pro-I prefer the mattress pad/heater in one over having a separate heater pad which results in more bunching. So far the low setting is perfect for keeping feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not diamond design
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with diamond design, some sort of lined pattern. See attached picture. Also not very soft to touch, not really sure why they would point that out in the description if it's the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: that one guy

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I have used every night for several months. I love this heated mattress pad. So far works perfectly with no issues. It is an amazing feeling to get into a warm bed every night. I use preheat or high while getting ready for bed then I usually turn down to low before going to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dsc

customer_reviews.title: Except for the heat, you don't know it's on your bed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely cannot feel the wires. Heats up uniformly. Have used it all winter without problems. A heated mattress pad is one of those things that, once you experience it, you can't seem to live without it. So far, so good on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I bought this for this winter
customer_reviews.text: Good thing I bought this for this winter, as it has been good and cold this week. It is keeping us nice and warm. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am on an electric system that charges larger rate at night...I use this in bed versus heating the rest of the house and it works like a charm...always toasty warm.
customer_reviews.author: KrystalJames

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for our queen RV bed.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps RV bed warm and cozy in the winter. Would not travel in the winter without it, but we keep it on our RV bed year-round.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Richard R. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it long, but it is working great so far. It is so nice to be able to preheat the bed on cold nights.
customer_reviews.author: Tango Fruitloop

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Its pricey for what it is but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Great—when it works
customer_reviews.text: The product is great when it works but almost every night gives an F2 fault requiring it be unplugged to reset
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: This mattress pad is amazing. I hope it keeps working because most others ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is amazing. I hope it keeps working because most others seem to poop out after a short while.
customer_reviews.author: Rcat

customer_reviews.title: M
customer_reviews.text: Does not warm up as quickly as our previous Mattress pad
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rice

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: Works very, very well. Nice to get into a warm bed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beekman

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bed warmer
customer_reviews.text: If they could have kept it connections off of the top of the mattress I could easily give this 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Larry Folta

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all year round. The only issue is you may miss work or school because you don't want to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Mains

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look forward to on a cold night
customer_reviews.text: Heat doesn't seem even to me. I need it most at my feet but am cold there while hot elsewhere. I end up turning it off part way through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It work better that any I’ve purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. PZ

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for someone who is always cold. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone who is always cold. We keep the temperature down in the winter to save energy. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: James Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Not up to sunbeam standards in design and does not work. Sending back.
customer_reviews.text: Forget buying this the setup is terrible and it did not work anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

product_meta.title: Sunbeam MSU5CQS-S000-12A00 Mattress Pad, King,White
product_meta.description: Color:White| Size:King| Style:Premium HeatedThe Sunbeam Luxury Quilted Electric Heated Mattress Pad provides you with comfort and warmth thanks to its its soft-quilted diamond design and 10 heat settings. This electric mattress heating pad is made with soft 100 percent cotton and is machine-washable and dryer-safe.
feature_bullets: Heated mattress pad with soft-quilted diamond design
ThermoFine technology delivers consistent, evenly distributed heat
10 heat settings let you choose the right amount of warmth
Preheat function lets you warm up your bed before you climb in
100% cotton topper with 9 oz. fill; machine-washable and dryer-safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
